desktop.title: Features
desktop.intro: Pair is an NPM Module for product teams to review & approve every build your front-end developers make. Our features help scale 1-to-1 designer-to-developer knowledge & collaboration for large software enterprise companies such as Twitter, Google, IBM, Facebook, & more.

sections.content: Pair offers the ability to approve all of your application components against any build. Engineers can share Pair URLs in Slack, Email, SMS, and more for instant collaboration from their product design teams.

Pair helps designers & developers experience their front-end design in various A11y user modes such as voice, contrast, & more. This helps product teams a better understand how their products are consumed & experienced for all user types.

Pair helps distribute and manage design systems for large scale component driven software development teams. Pair gives developers the ability to create instant ad hoc Pair URLs for design system theming and third party reviews.
